title: CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 43 Apprentice Trainee Posts
description: CSIR Central Salt and Marine Chemicals Research Institute (CSIR CSMCRI) has declared he official notification for 2025. To fill up the 43 vacancies for Apprentice Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the ITI, B.E/ B.Tech in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, can grab this chance and apply for the CSIR CSMCRI Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, educational details, application fee, and how to apply fo...
